item.description:
Howdy!! Hope you all will join us this Saturday nite for the Halloween Dance featuring Bobby Carlson and Stones River. There will be costume judging for those wishing to participate and also Jack O Lantern judging with prizes awarded. Come early and take Michelle's fun, easy, dance lessons. So....you never line danced before??? well, come on and give it a try! Its going to be a monster country mash....


Note: Save the date! Mark your calendars now for December 4, 2010...Nashville recording artist, Sean Patrick McGraw (My So Called Life) will be at the Yard

Get your apps in for the Country Dance workshop for Nov 6 by Oct 30
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
